channel.title: I Think A Major Hack Has Slipped Back Into RS
channel.description:
My Friend was killing guards in falador yesterday, Trying for the new clue scrolls, When some level 87 attacked him, Yes, A player, My friend got speced for 2 30's with the dude using a dds then the guy finished him with a d-long, Do you think this could be something to do with the "old" Autorune Crew?
Post Comments Please, This is very intresting.
~~Jake Mc :P

item.title: I Think A Major Hack Has Slipped Back Into RS
item.dc:creator: @Coca_Cola Coca Cola
item.description:
@Coca_Cola wrote:

There was a bug that allowed you to attack people outside of the wilderness. I am aware of how it was done. You would go to non multi wilderness and telly to duel arena/c wars, and you could still attack people. It sounds stupid that no-one spotted it. But it’s true - it worked. Me and a few friends worked with it but my friends account got banned (Half thanks to me as I used the bug loads on his acc ^_^)

~Crax

Read full topic
item.source: I Think A Major Hack Has Slipped Back Into RS

item.title: I Think A Major Hack Has Slipped Back Into RS
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Dukly:

… i did a quick job, i didnt bother to set the tool i was using, i didnt do any cropping, and i never said i could ACTUALLY attack people.

Then why did you post the picture? This thread is about a GLITCH THAT LETS YOU ATTCK PEOPLE, not you and something totally unrelated.

Read full topic

item.title: I Think A Major Hack Has Slipped Back Into RS
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“dinetime, post:29, topic:32552”]yes the crew at taintedonce did it before.

very simple

1.1511.1 of a seconds delay of the quard gives a player nearly .1222111 of a second to attack a player so if ur very fast u can click on somebody and aTTK THEm

did it before spend almost 1 month trying it out insanely hard u need to lag at the same time it happens to do it correctly[/quote]

Why would you bother lying?

Read full topic

item.source: I Think A Major Hack Has Slipped Back Into RS

item.title: I Think A Major Hack Has Slipped Back Into RS
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You moron . . . you said it in the text

“I can’t actually attack people”

The reason you have the attack option is because during lag, the client misses the update packets

(They will be buffered, then the buffer will be flushed but the contents don’t get to the event queue)

So the client never deletes the command option “Attack”. Thats no glitch, thats just a result of your shitty shitty crap crap of a computer.

And by the way, your cropping skills suck ass.

Read full topic

item.title: I Think A Major Hack Has Slipped Back Into RS
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

LMFAO!
First of all, idiot, speak with some proper grammar. I think the only people that can clearly understand what you are saying are other fags that don’t know how to type correctly. (Note how I said “other” fags, which means I’m including you, queer)
Secondly, idiot, I know exactly what the “fuck” you are talking about, dumbass. I’m saying that just because he, Jake MC, said that he saw someone kill his “friend” out of wildy doesn’t mean it’s true. So read the other post more clearly before you go making yourself look like a dumbfuck.

Oh, and incase you still don’t understand, idiot, I was “lawling” at your post. Then, after I put the “break” I started talking about Jake’s post. So before you go talking shit, as I said earlier, read the post more clearly. Cause right now, you just made yourself look like a fucking idiot.

“noobowned” What a faggot.

I know how to get the attack option in a POH house don’t know if it still works though.

you just go into the boxing ring dont you? some guy was showing me the other day telling me he was a 1337 haxon and i was like yes yes i know you are -_-…
[/quote]
lawl.
It’s funny how any ol’ random person can come up and say they saw a hack and everyone believe them. This guy could be a straight up liar for all we know. Just trying to get some attention.[/quote]
erm you want to shut the fuck up?
lol your a fag.
you dont even understand what we were talking about.
its when you go into the boxing ring and come back out, and when you right click on people the attack button is there but when you clikc attack you cant attack anyone.
noobowned.
